name: Cosmic Adventure
description:
Hello guys, this is my first 3D game... It was made following a udemy course and I have modified it a bit and released it... Hope you enjoy it. =D

Instructions :-

-Use the left and right arrow keys to rotate your rocket

-Use the space bar to thrust

-Avoid touching obstacles

-Reach to the green landing pad to progress to the next level

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:-

-Art :- me, Google poly

-Code :- me, Udemy course

-Idea :- udemy course

-Music :- Ecrett music
